lines.text: These drums are gonna drive me off my nut.
For me? Thanks. You - You must always bring tea to the lady first.

[frowns, stands, points to another man]
He bring.
What do you think of our little Liane?
Mmm, what is she, next to a woman like you? A pretty little bubblehead.
Some men prefer pretty little bubbleheads, all the same.
Well well, you must've had a fight with Danner, eh?
Of course not, but you mustn't feel angry because I can manage monkeys and women better than you.
Well, that just means I have three idiots to take care of now.
If you want to know the truth... Yep.
Yes, what are we going to do now?
